https://doi.org/10.7927/np6p-qe61.Description: The Global Rural-Urban Mapping Project, v1 (GRUMPv1): Urban Extent Polygons Revision 02 dataset provides a polygon representation of urban areas with city or agglomeration name and time series population estimates.
https://doi.org/10.7927/np6p-qe61.Project: GRUMP - Global Rural Urban Mapping Project

https://dx.doi.org/10.7927/dv72-s254.Description: The Georeferenced U.S. County-Level Population Projections Total and by Sex, Race, and Age Based on the SSPs (v1): 2020-2100 dataset provides population projections and demographic information for the entire US. These data may be useful in addressing questions about environmental justice and human health disparities.
